page.title: 18REDDISH VALE BATHS
page.content: The baths igo to are at reddish vale School . On monday evenings there is a family night andabout25 families go.there changing rooms which are quite big and they have benches and pegs for your clothes.In them they have showers which are next to the pool.The pool goes from 3FTto 10FT in depth.Ithas tiled floors and walls which are white.There is a diving board.When you get there you go in for about an hour.After 3 months you get a bill which everyone shares. At the shchool they also have;judo,weight-lifting and other recreational activities.
